        public boolean addUser​(java.lang.String password,
                       java.lang.String username)
        Adds a new user
        Parameters:
        password - the password of the new user
        username - the username of the new user
        Returns:

      • connectUser

        public User connectUser​(java.lang.String username,
                        java.lang.String password)
        Returns the User if the username is inside the database, and if the password is correct
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the user
        password - the password of the user
        Returns:
        The user if he could 'login' correctly, null if not
